PostToolUse.description: Auto-capture CI failure signals from test/lint output
PostToolUse.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_OUTPUT" | grep -qiE '(FAIL|FAILED|ERROR|exit code [1-9])'; then SIGNAL_DIR=".sniper/memory/signals"; mkdir -p "$SIGNAL_DIR"; TS=$(node -e "process.stdout.write(new Date().toISOString())"); EPOCH=$(node -e "process.stdout.write(String(Date.now()))"); SIGNAL_FILE="$SIGNAL_DIR/$(echo $TS | cut -c1-10 | tr -d '-')-ci_failure-${EPOCH}.yaml"; echo "type: ci_failure" > "$SIGNAL_FILE"; echo "source: bash-output" >> "$SIGNAL_FILE"; echo "timestamp: ${TS}" >> "$SIGNAL_FILE"; echo "summary: CI failure detected in command output" >> "$SIGNAL_FILE"; echo 'Signal captured to '"$SIGNAL_FILE"; fi
